body.description: Incorporating various high-quality components, the smart series - models are Rated from 500W to 700W - saves energy through its high efficiency of up to 86% and accommodates any mainstream build with the most demanding requirements. An embedded intelligent cooling fan delivers excellent Airflow at an exceptionally low noise level. Additionally, the single +12V rail design enables non-stop usage with stable and reliable performance. Smart Series adopt 120mm cooling fan delivers excellent Airflow at an exceptionally low noise level. Smart Series saves energy through its high energy efficiency of up to 86% and is 80 PLUS standard Certified. High quality components enable non-stop usage with stable and reliable performance, no more capacitor explosion and leakage. Single +12V output. p/N: ps-spd-0500npcw-w short model: sp-500ah2nkw type: Intel ATX 12V 2. 3max. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Budget-friendly option for those looking for a reliable power supply unit
reviews.reviewText: The Thermaltake 500W 80+ White Certified Smart Power Supply is a budget-friendly option for those looking for a reliable power supply unit. With its 80+ White certification and smart features, it promises to deliver efficient power delivery and intelligent control. In this extensive review, we will delve into its features, performance, build quality, and overall value for money.Features:The Thermaltake 500W power supply comes equipped with a range of features that make it stand out in its price range. Firstly, the 80+ White certification ensures that it operates at a minimum efficiency of 80%, reducing energy wastage and saving you money on your electricity bills. Additionally, the smart features allow for real-time monitoring of power usage, temperature, and fan speed through the Thermaltake software.Performance:In terms of performance, the Thermaltake 500W power supply delivers reliable and stable power to your system. It handles normal workloads with ease, providing a consistent power supply without any noticeable voltage fluctuations. The power supply's efficiency ensures that it runs cool, minimizing the need for excessive fan noise. However, it is important to note that this unit is more suitable for mid-range systems, as it may struggle to handle high-end gaming rigs or heavy overclocking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable Power for Your Rig
reviews.reviewText: The Thermaltake Smart 700W 80+ White Certified PSU is great when it comes to delivering consistent and reliable power to your computer. As a PC enthusiast, I was on the hunt for a power supply unit (PSU) that could handle my rig's demands, without breaking the bank.80+ White Certified Efficiency:The 80+ White certification guarantees efficiency, which is vital for reducing energy waste and heat generation. This not only saves on electricity bills but also extends the lifespan of your components. The Thermaltake Smart PSU excels in this regard, making it both cost-effective and environmentally friendly.Ultra Quiet Operation:One of the most impressive features of this PSU is its ultra-quiet 120mm fan. Even during intense gaming sessions or resource-heavy tasks, the fan operates silently. It maintains a cool temperature within the PSU, ensuring long-term reliability without adding unwanted noise to your PC.Multiple Connectors and Protection Features:The PSU comes with an array of connectors, including PCIe, SATA, and Molex, allowing for versatile connectivity with various components. Additionally, it offers over-voltage and short-circuit protection, ensuring the safety of your components in the event of power fluctuations or surges.Compact and Easy Installation:The Thermaltake Smart PSU is designed to be compact and easy to install in standard ATX cases. The connectors are well-labeled and user-friendly, making it a hassle-free experience for both novice and experienced builders.Competitive Price:The competitive pricing of this PSU is a significant selling point. It offers high-quality performance and reliability without breaking the bank, making it an attractive choice for those on a budget.In conclusion, the Thermaltake Smart 700W 80+ White Certified PSU is a fantastic choice for anyone in need of a reliable and efficient power supply for their PC build. It delivers a stable 700W of power, ensures efficiency and quiet operation, and offers essential protection features. Whether you're a gamer, content creator, or simply need a dependable PSU for your everyday tasks, this unit provides it all. It's a five-star addition to any system, and I wholeheartedly recommend it for your PC build or upgrade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable and Efficient: Thermaltake Smart 430W Power Supply Shines!
reviews.reviewText: The Thermaltake Smart 430W Power Supply has proven to be an invaluable addition to my PC setup. Its performance, efficiency, and reliability have exceeded my expectations, and here's why I'm giving it a five-star review.First and foremost, the power supply's 80+ White certification is a testament to its efficiency. It operates with high energy efficiency, minimizing wastage and reducing electricity costs in the long run. This is a key factor for environmentally-conscious users like myself.The continuous power output of 430W provides ample support for my system's components. It handles my CPU, GPU, and peripherals with ease, ensuring stable and consistent power delivery. This has translated into smooth and reliable performance during both casual use and demanding tasks.The ATX 12V V2.3/EPS 12V compliance ensures compatibility with a wide range of systems, making it a versatile choice for various builds. The power supply also supports Active PFC (Power Factor Correction), contributing to better power utilization and reduced energy consumption.Installation was a breeze, thanks to the clear and concise instructions provided. The included cables are of sufficient length, allowing for neat cable management within the case. This not only improves airflow but also enhances the overall aesthetics of the build.The power supply operates quietly and efficiently. It doesn't produce excessive heat or noise, contributing to a more comfortable and enjoyable computing experience.The build quality is commendable. The unit feels robust and well-constructed, instilling confidence in its durability and longevity. It's clear that Thermaltake prioritizes quality in their products.In terms of value, the Thermaltake Smart 430W Power Supply offers an excellent price-to-performance ratio. It provides reliable and efficient power delivery at a competitive price point, making it a smart investment for any PC enthusiast.In summary, the Thermaltake Smart 430W Power Supply has proven itself to be a reliable workhorse for my system. Its efficiency, compatibility, and build quality make it a standout choice for any PC build. If you're seeking a dependable power supply that delivers on all fronts, look no further. This power supply is a five-star gem that I wholeheartedly recommend!
